## patchObj() function

Reducer for [Patch](./transducers-patch.patch.md) based immutable object updates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function patchObj(): Reducer<any, PatchObjOp>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<any, PatchObjOp>`

## Remarks

Only the following patch types are supported: - SET - UPDATE - DELETE
